feature.label: djUnit plugin for Eclipse 3.7.x
feature.description: 0.8.6 [2011/09/30] - Changed a exception handler of djUnit class loader. - [Fixed bug] Mojibake of djUnit class loader message. - [Fixed bug] SWT's "no more handles" occurs - Bytecode process was improved.
